title: 10-night Fly & Tour: Vietnam Express Southbound
inclusions_evidence: Economy class flights from Auckland to Hanoi and Ho Chi Minh City
10-day small group trip from Hanoi to Ho Chi Minh City
Accommodation: Hotel (7 nights), Overnight boat (1 night), Overnight sleeper train (1 night)

flights.assumed_route: Auckland to Hanoi and Ho Chi Minh City to Auckland

other.notes: Meals and activities during the tour are not included in DIY pricing.

reasoning: The deal offers a comprehensive package including flights, accommodation, and meals, which provides convenience and potential savings compared to DIY booking.
additional_notes: Consider additional costs for meals not included in the package.
